articles.title: Bengal SSC scam case LIVE Updates: Bengal minister Partha Chatterjee to be in ED custody till Monday
articles.description:
West Bengal cabinet minister Partha Chatterjee's close aide, who had Rs 20 crore in cash at home, has been arrested. Partha Chatterjee was produced before the Bankshall Court in Kolkata. The hearing will begin soon.
Partha Chatterjee was arrested today by the…
articles.content:

articles.title: Woman Gang-Raped At New Delhi Station, 4 Railway Staff Arrested: Police
articles.description: Four railway employees have been arrested in connection with the gangrape of a 30-year-old woman on a platform at New Delhi railway station late, police said.
articles.content:
Police said all the four accused are employees of the Railways' Electrical Department.
